Text: Obafemi Awolowo:  He was the first premier of the Western Region and later federal commissioner for finance, and vice chairman of the Federal Executive Council during the Civil War.

Text: Obafemi Awolowo:  In recognition of all these, Awolowo was the first individual in the modern era to be named "Leader of the Yorubas" (Yoruba: Asiwaju Awon Yoruba or Asiwaju Omo Oodua).
